description:
Protection of a hardshell with the flexiblity of soft protection, the VPD Air provide light-duty protection that won't impede your movement. Designed by trials and downhill rider Fabio Wibmer.

  • Stretch fabric with anti-slip neoprene lining keeps pad secure and comfortable
  • VPD Air padding is flexible and supple, but hardens instantly on impact
  • Padding has small holes for ventilation
  • Hook-and-loop bottom strap keeps pad in place during a crash
name: POC VPD Air Elbow Fabio Ed. Protection - Unisex
